name: Uncovering The Roots
description:
Going down your family tree to find out the truth about your Finnish roots in this narrative game! How to play:

 - Hover over the documents to find clues and see the notes on important parts.

- You can drag the documents around and organize the table however you want! 

- Some documents might have multiple clues, so pay attention >_> 

- If you hit a dead-end (no new clues appear) you can still check any unused clues to continue down the rabbit hole of ancestry research.

Global jam page: https://globalgamejam.org/2023/games/project-mystery-3

Credits:

Pham Quang Bach: Code, Story, Game Design

Daria Bokovaya: Visuals, Story, Dame Design

Music: Anamalie Kevin MacLeod (incompetech.com)
